description:
Split profiles
Splits profile. Output dir name is based on input file name
flag_input: Profile file to splitter. By default all profiles will be splitted
example_splitAllAndRemoveSource:
# Split all and remove source (Recommended in CICD systems)
sfdx metadata:profiles:split -r
example_splitOnlyOneProfile:
# Splits only specified profile
sfdx metadata:profiles:split -i CustomProfile.profile-meta.xml
